## Logon Loader - A Customized Login Screen for Windows 

If you're tired of staring at the same old login screen every time you boot up your Windows computer, you're not alone. Most Windows users would love to customize their login screen to something more fun or personalized. However, Windows doesn't provide any built-in options to do so. This is where Logon Loader comes in.

Logon Loader is a free software that allows you to customize your Windows login screen easily. With its user-friendly interface and wide range of customization options, Logon Loader is a must-have tool for anyone who wants to personalize their desktop experience.

### How Logon Loader Works

Logon Loader works by replacing the default Windows login screen with a custom image or animation of your choice. You can either choose from Logon Loader's extensive library of pre-made images and animations or create your own using your favorite image editing software.

The software supports a range of image formats, including JPEG, BMP, and PNG. You can also create animated login screens using GIF, AVI, or MPEG formats. Once you've selected your image or animation, Logon Loader automatically converts it to the correct format and installs it as your new login screen.

### Customization Options

Logon Loader offers a range of customization options to help you create the perfect login screen for your needs. Here are some of the key features it offers:

- **Customizable Text** - You can add custom text to your login screen, such as your name or a welcome message for your guests.

- **Transparent Login Box** - You can make your login box transparent, so your custom login screen image is fully visible.

- **Audio Support** - You can add a custom sound to your login screen, such as your favorite song or sound effect.

- **Password Recovery** - Logon Loader includes a password recovery feature, which saves your Windows password in case you forget it.

### Why Use Logon Loader

Logon Loader is a simple yet powerful tool that can help you personalize your Windows computer in a matter of minutes. Here are some reasons why you should use Logon Loader:

- **Easy to Install and Use** - Logon Loader is easy to install and use. You don't need any special skills or knowledge to customize your login screen using this software.

- **Wide Range of Customization Options** - With Logon Loader, you have access to a wide range of customization options, so you can create a login screen that truly reflects your personality and style.

- **Free and Open-Source** - Logon Loader is completely free and open-source, so you don't have to pay anything to use it. You can also modify the source code to suit your needs.

### Conclusion

Logon Loader is a great software for anyone who wants to customize their Windows login screen without any hassle. It's easy to use, offers a wide range of customization options, and is completely free and open-source. If you're tired of staring at the same boring login screen every time you boot up your computer, give Logon Loader a try. You won't be disappointed.
